00170 
00175   typedef struct{
00176     atom_type atom;             
00177     orbit_type orbit;           
00178     my_float_t vdw_radius;      
00179   }atom_info_t;
00180 
00183   class AtomTypes{
00184   public:
00187 
00192     static const atom_info_t*    
00193     lookup_vdw_rad(const atom_type atom, const orbit_type orbit = DEFAULT_ORBIT)
00194     {
00195        if(vdw_table.empty()) build_vdw_table();
00196        std::multimap<atom_type, const atom_info_t*>::const_iterator tbl_iter;
00197        tbl_iter = vdw_table.find(atom);
00198        if(tbl_iter == vdw_table.end()) return 0; 
00199 
00200        for(;tbl_iter != vdw_table.end() && tbl_iter->first == atom; ++tbl_iter){
00201          if(tbl_iter->second->orbit == orbit) return tbl_iter->second;
00202        }
00203        return 0;
00204     }
00205 
00206   private:
00208     static void build_vdw_table();
00209 
00210     static std::multimap<atom_type, const atom_info_t*> vdw_table;
00211     static const uint A_atoms_array_size;
00212     static const atom_info_t A_atoms_array[];
00213   };
00214 }
